content.detailedDescription:
1 bringing my kids home from work
2 i looked to the sky and noticed it and knew it was not normal
3 it was a ufo no other thing could be
4 it was triangle 3 bright lights one that was less bright in middle almost shining down to ground
5 amazed knew it was a ufo. calm very calm
6 as i was following it as i got to an opening to see it fully it was stand still for a moment then took off in the opposite direction it was going and disappeared i even turned around the to find it and it was gone
content.flightPath: Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: I was driving home on 9th st me i looked to my left and i saw this object in the sky it was traveling very slow as i reached where it was it was just sitting there i stopped my truck me it went the opposite direction it was first going and disappeared.  i

content.detailedDescription: Sitting in my driveway talking to my niece on my cell phone. i happened to look up over to the right and saw a fire ball in the air.  i heard a jet more to the south that just took off from the airport,l but it was headed in a different direction. the object flew from the south to the north, i didn't have much time to watch it because of the trees in my view. i ran down to the end of the drive way but i didm;t see it again.  i am an air force veteran that worked with alot of different aircraft. i know what afterburners look like when lit. this was no afterburner.
content.summary: Ball of fire headed north

content.detailedDescription:
Out stargazing with 9x63 binoculars with 20 yr. old son, perfectly clear night, good dark sky (no moon).  looking north-east towards maybe lyra or cygnus, large dark shadow crossed fov, moving almost directly north to south .. blocked starlight as it moved, no lights but definitely could make out an outline.     no sound, object flew at  constant velocity and straight.  difficult to tell distance of object ... definitely blocked multiple stars in backdrop as it cross the sky which gave me the mental impression the object must be lower in elevation ... but with no standard aeronautical lights it seemed out of place.  son was standing next to me and could neither see nor hear anything .. i thought about transferring the binoculars but it was moving so quickly and was essentially "black" in form against a mostly black dark sky, i knew there would be no possible way for him to locate it.   as it moved i could detect or sense a general shape ..  at least for the leading edge .. a very subtle angle from tip sweeping back to both sides .. reminded me of the old flying wing shape from northrum ... at least on the front edge.   could not clearly distinguish shape in rear of craft.    this was not a satellite or space station ... those are quite bright.  this object was dark, and indistinguishably quiet.   not like anything i've ever witnessed before ... 

hoping someone else along utah's wasatch front maybe saw this object as well but given its exquisite stealth (visual and audible) behavior ... i would be surprise if it was noticed by anyone w/o binoculars looking skyward at the stars.    it would be interesting to see if a radar signature was detected from the salt lake airport at around this time ?

after the sighting was over i had to wonder if it was a military test flight .. but this seemed implausible as it would be highly unusual to fly in the dark, over populated cities.  no way for me to distinguish height of object though .. but physically seeing it block multiple stars as it flew makes me believe it was at a lower altitude .. somewhere within the commercial level airspace .. at altitudes consistent with helicopter to small fixed wing aircraft altitudes.   if it was any higher, the object would have had to have been massive!!
content.summary: Darkened object moving from north to south, caught sight in binoculars, no sound, no lights ... eerie

content.detailedDescription: I was in my bedroom laying down to go to sleep and i felt the urge to look outside my window. it was in between 9-10pm. when i looked out my window i saw a large, black, triangle-shaped ufo.  the ufo had a pattern of light orange lights on the outside of it. it just sat above the trees and hovered for a good minute. after a blink of my eyes, i opened them to find the craft to have disappeared. it never made any noise, there was no trail left in the sky where it had been. it just vanished.  the following night i went to my friends house for a bon fire. i hadn't told anyone of my encounter for fear of ridicule.  my two friends who wish to remain nameless had been pointing in the sky. they screamed and stated that i just missed the ufo. i asked them what it looked like and they repeated the craft in which they saw to be identical to what i had seen the night before... without even knowing that i had seen the same craft prior to that night. i couldn't feel as if something was watching me.  to this day, i'm not sure if it was just a coincidence or if the space craft was outside my window for a reason and then followed me to the bonfire the following night as well.. the space craft and i were the two variables in both events.
content.summary: Black triangle shaped ufo with orange lights outside my bedroom window and also the next night at a bonfire with friends

content.detailedDescription: I was taking pictures of chemtrails in the sky from my cellphone
content.summary: I was taking pictures of chemtrails in the sky from my cellphone

content.detailedDescription:
I was in my apartment on 06/20/2014 at 00:25 i got up to close the window. i noticed about 5 lights traveling pretty much in a straight line, and close together,at about the same speed,fly over my apartment building. since they were so close together,i knew they were not airplanes. when i noticed the first five lights, they were already on top of me,i only saw them for a few seconds before they flew over my building.When looked back at the south horizon,and since i live on the seventh floor i can see a long way. i saw three more lights. one in front,two behind side by side. flying on the same line as the five others.I watched for about 30 seconds, until they also flew over my building.When i looked back at the horizon. i saw one more light. it traveled on the same line as the others. i watched it for about 30 seconds before it too,flew over my building.
i don't what they were. if i had to guess i'd say some kind of drone. took me forever to get to sleep last night.
content.summary: Observed about 9 bright lights fly over my apartment.

content.detailedDescription:
I  went on an after noon drive by the government docks in sarnia ontario  i noticed a chinese freighter, straight down the docks , i  took two photos of the ship
when i got home i noticed an object in the photos above the ship
i don't know if this is  a phone  artifact or an actual ufo   you be the judge there are two photos below facing west of the photo is the st. clair river and port huron michigan is west of the photo
content.summary: Afternoon drive with intention of taking photos of ship

content.detailedDescription: At dusk, on 6/18/2014, while sitting on a neighbor's back deck in hampstead, nc, i witnessed a triangular aircraft flying extremely low to the ground, just above the treeline. the craft, who's wingspan was approximately sixty feet in length, flew through our development, which sits just west of the atlantic intracoastal waterway. the sound of the object is what first caught my attention; it hummed like a commercial jet except not as loud. i looked towards the sound and a moment later it passed in front of me, flying over a small lake that is bordered by homes. it was travelling east to west at a "casual" speed, and once it passed the house, it banked to the right at a severe angle, exposing its "belly", and flew across the adjacent property. the underside of the craft was dark gray and had three bright white circular lights at each of its points. at its center was another circular light, slightly larger than the other three, and its color was a glowing, pulsating bright orange-red. that light was encircled by another thin ring of red. because the marine corps base camp lejeune is located approximately 30 minutes north of our area, we often see military jets flying over our skies, but never have we seen one like this, nor have we seen one fly so low. the craft continued in a northerly direction and i lost sight of it once it passed the western side of the house.
content.summary: Low flying triangular aircraft with three white lights at each of its points and red-orange, pulsating light at its center

content.detailedDescription:
On thanksgiving night in 2013, my husband and i were driving on southbound i71 from lebanon to deerfield township. we had decided to take advantage of some of thursday night's black friday sales at the big shopping centers around deerfield township. it was around 8:30 pm that we were making the drive. we noticed the first orb as we came into view of kings island, a major amusement park in our area that is situated right next to the interstate. the orb became visible over the tree line south of us as we drove south on the interstate. 

at first we both thought that the red-orange light was perhaps a helicopter with its search light on. as we came closer it was obvious that the light was simply being emitted around the orb, it was not a steady beam pointed toward the ground like a helicopter's search light (which we were both familiar with, having lived in a questionable area of columbus, ohio for a couple years.) we were speculating that perhaps then it was a low flying plane, but couldn't justify such a low flight path considering how far we were from the major airports in convington, ky and dayton, oh. then the second orb appeared behind the first, following it precisely in a straight line. not long after that the third orb appeared behind the second. they were all spaced the same distance apart. from our vantage point on i71s it looked as though they were maybe 150-200 yards above the interstate and about 40-50 yards apart. 

these three orbs were red-orange in color. they were not blinking on and off in anyway. every so often they would kind of brighten with a yellow tint, but in no way did they disappear and reappear. they remained visible the entire time. because of the distance and the speed we were moving it was hard to judge the actual size of the orbs, but i would estimate they were at least as large as our car(ford focus), but no larger than your standard sized helicopter that say the police or local news agencies would use. they moved in a straight line above the interstate heading north. they did not waver from this line or change direction as far as we could see.

during the sighting we did not have any issues with our vehicle or other mechanical/electronic devices with us. there was no feelings of fright or unease, no nausea or headaches, just amazement at what we were seeing.

all told, by the time we reached the fields ertel exit on i71s and lost sight of the orbs, we had viewed them for about eight and a half minutes. i have kept a keen eye out ever since, hoping to catch a glimpse of something, anything similar to those three orbs, but i have not seen anything.
content.summary: 3 red orange orbs hovering low over southbound i71. after a moment, it was clear they were moving slowly north in a straight line.

content.detailedDescription: My mom came to visit and we went outside to check on my animals because they were acting strange. the dogs were barking like they would with a stranger and my sheep were huddled in the corner of their pen. the light from the object was so bright i couldn't help but notice it. i didn't know what it was. i automatically knew what it wasn't. it wasn't a plane or a helicopter. it hovered in the air and made no sound. a helicopter flew directly over it and it remained stationary. the light was bright yellow and grew brighter. then it began to ascend and the light dimmed. it then flew from the south east to north west and a fairly fast speed. when it was directly overhead i could make out a black outline and it appeared to be oval shaped. there were 2 more lights visible by this time and they were a blueish green color. not as bright as the yellow light. none of the lights flickered or blinked. they were stationary. the whole time it moved, it made no sound at all. it was completely silent. once it was out of sight, about 10 minutes later, the air outside smelled like lit matches or sulfur.
content.summary: Bright light hovering then moving with no sound

content.detailedDescription: My mom came to visit and we went outside to check on my animals because they were acting strange. the dogs were barking like they would with a stranger and my sheep were huddled in the corner of their pen. the light from the object was so bright i couldn't help but notice it. i didn't know what it was. i automatically knew what it wasn't. it wasn't a plane or a helicopter. it hovered in the air and made no sound. a helicopter flew directly over it and it remained stationary. the light was bright yellow and grew brighter. then it began to ascend and the light dimmed. it then flew from the south east to north west and a fairly fast speed. when it was directly overhead i could make out a black outline and it appeared to be oval shaped. there were 2 more lights visible by this time and they were a blueish green color. not as bright as the yellow light. none of the lights flickered or blinked. they were stationary. the whole time it moved, it made no sound at all. it was completely silent. once it was out of sight, about 10 minutes later, the air outside smelled like lit matches or sulfur.
content.flightPath: Hovering then path,Path with directional change
content.summary: Bright light hovering then moving overhead, no sound

content.detailedDescription: At the time of the ufo sighting i was watching a movie. i heard a bang from outside and looked out my window to investigate. i noticed lights in the sky. at first i thought it was a plane. then i noticed that the lights did not move for almost 5 minutes. it was too dark to know what the object was but i know the canadian government does not openly have hovering, circle like aircraft. for about 4 and a half minutes, the craft hovered what appeared to be over my neighbours' house. for the last 30 seconds, the craft slowly lifted upwards, and then zoomed away. i lost sight when it zoomed away from my eyesight. i always believed that extra-terrestrials existed, now i've seen what i think is an alien craft in my neighbourhood.
content.summary: Looked out my window, saw lights, lights hovered, 5 minutes pass, lights zoom up.

content.detailedDescription: During patrol, i observed this craft flying in a straight line, heading towards lakeville, pa. this craft had only a single light without strobe lights required for flight, typically on a wing and tail sections. no sounds from this craft at anytime and no air disruption. flight over the area lasted only nine seconds, traveling at above 600 mph. it never landed as far as i could see. the object caught my peripheral vision from my left during this surveillance, coming from a southwest direction and ended up flying to the northeast.
content.summary: This craft had one single light, no running lights or sounds, small like a round headlight, flying in a straight line towards lakeville, pa. no air disruption or sound before or after this flight, which lasted nine seconds.

content.detailedDescription:
I will not disclose my interactions and communication with these beings on the internet. i was followed before, during, and after the vent. audio of my pwrsuers witnessing and realizing my abduction is very persuasive. i have been investigated by a faceless organization seeking to recover all of my evidence; much of which will not be made public or duplicated because of my own personal interests.

i have had telepathy ever since i was struck by lightning in 2004. i have never spoke out about my abilities; but they are the reaaon behind my latest abductions. i contacted the few on board the craft once i had enough evidence gathered to sit down and tune in. 

i called out, felt observed, and explained exactly who i was and why those beings need me, not want me. i explained my understanding of consciousness. that's all i have to say about contacting this craft.

the private area around a lake where this had taken place usually has no traffic after 11:30; given the weather, it should have had zero cars on it. a small team of vans and mid size suvs showed up 20-40 minutes after i began my observations. this is where i am going to ask you to do what you wish with my report; a follow up is in order. i want to state that i am not looking to make my experiences,evidence, and knowledge a public affair. i am scared for my safety after what i've gone through and the events that have happened to me and still are to this day. 

i have been subject to drugging to intoxication via cigarette to having my mercedes tampered and altered for this faceless organization to perfirm their nexessary  roles. 

my story quite frankly scares me to the point that i have never spoken out to anybody except my safekeeper for my files release. 

my evidences setup, recording, and misleading final concealment was all possible because i had an insurance investigation unit persue me in fear of a fraudulent claim. i was setup for counter surveillance better than any person should ever need to be. this does not record my mental and biological changes, but gives the support needed to realize the truth.

i am leaving for my vacation properties down south soon, i will be without signal of any type; so contact me soon via cell phone call and i'll help you with my story.
content.flightPath: Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: I initiated contact via telepathy. hundreds of photos including video of my abduction (multiple devices)

content.detailedDescription:
I was outside doing a crossword puzzle. i looked up, thinking it was a contrail, but it didn't dissipate. i asked the wife to look and she saw it. it was very bright and the ends on both sides seem to waver at times. it hovered back and forth from north to south without changing shape or size for about 45 minutes. i took some photos and a few minutes of video, but it was there for so long that we got hungry and grilled some fish... i can imagine that 1000's of people saw this tonight. i would just like a rational answer, maybe something meteorological? i've been searching for an explanation to this all night and haven't found anything. any insight appreciated. 

thanks!

[name removed/cms/tg]
content.summary: Shining white sliver in the daytime sky

content.detailedDescription: Herro i much very scared.
content.summary: I scared very scared

content.detailedDescription: I was driving my daughter and her boyfriend when we noticed a large glowing light hovering above the foothills between canyon lake and lake elsinore..At first we thought it was a helicopter or flare but then realized it was to big and bright and it was changing direction including descending behind the hill and then reappearing..My daughter then saw 3 more objects appear in a diagonal shape and disappear ..I then saw a second object, same color - bright orange/yellow but it quickly disappeared. one remained hovering for about 10 minutes..I drove in the direction of the object to get a better look but then we lost sight of it, not sure if it disappeared or just descended..I turned back around and it was just gone..No sight of it ascending or flying away..A black helicopter then flew over to where it was hovering..At home we searched online for any eyewitness reports and found a post by a couple from orange county who filmed exactly what we saw on the same night (6/18/14)..Orange county is about 40 minutes away. we were all pretty amazed at what we saw because this time it was at night when in the recent past we've only seen ufos out here during the day which are hard to see.
content.summary: Bright glowing orange/yellow lights hovering and seen descending, moving and disappearing

content.detailedDescription:
My ex-wife and i had spent the day hiking at a camp ground known as alum creek south of hawthorne nevada. by the time we had returned back to the car it was almost dark. as we were traveling toward town, i looked north east toward highway 95 south and noticed bright lights which appeared as though we car lights traveling toward hawthorne from tonapah. it wasn't until an actual car rounded the point of the mountain on 95 that i realized that the light i was looking at was actually airborne and not on the highway. our travel was north on nv359 about 10 miles from hawthorne.  as we watched the lights move toward hawthorne, i reached town and turned right on 1st street where i then made my way to o street and parked on the corner of town. i turned off the lights of my car and then the ignition and exited the car as the lights approached. i had first thought that it was a formation of helicopters (as many army helicopters always in the area). there was no sound of rotary wings as a helicopter would make as it approached my position. the lights seemed to get brighter as it was upon me and over 50 group of hawthorne army ammunition depot. i got a good view of the lights as it passed between 1st street and west rd that is the main road that feeds into 50 group.  the lights looked like search lights and were in a triangle on the leading edge of some sort of craft. the leading edge was not rounded off like that of a wing, but rather squared off and had indentions but that is all the illumination of the lights would allow me to see. the night sky was very dark and could not make out a trailing edge of craft. as this thing flew over all you could hear was a low hum, like that of high tension wires with current through it. no anti-collision lights nor wing tip or vertical stab lights noted. as the craft continued over me to the opposite side of town, it slowly turned to follow 359 south to mono lake. i got back in the car and told my wife i didn't know what that was, but i know that it was a single craft of some sort.  she said she never seen anything like it and didn't want to see anything like it again. we made a pack not to say anything about it...Ever. after watching your program and now knowing that others have seen the same thing ( or like it) i'm compelled to tell my story. couldn't start my car after the sifting for some time...About a half hour.
  have no video or photo evidence to confirm this sighting.  certainly wasn't expecting to see anything like this.
content.summary: Come from direction of tonapah nevada toward hawthorne nevada then toward mono lake california very low in sky.

content.detailedDescription: Driving on rt 441 outside tmi with 2 friends. we were looking at aircraft cause there's an airport close by and notice maybe 6(?) triangle shaped flying objects. we say and watched them and it almost looked like a dog fight but you could tell they were friendly with each other, although the maneuvers they were making were odd for planes and then they seemed to get closer so we got in the car to leave and had trouble starting the engine. then we left but they "followed" us. i droped one friend off, then the other. 2nd friend i dropped off we got out of car for cigarette n to talk about what we saw and got "buzzed" by what seemed to be a fire ball tge size of my mazda. i got in my car and speed a mile home. when i got in my room i looked out my bedroom window and there was a very large, grey, metal flying saucer hovering above the development about 2 miles north of my house. i had an overwhelming sense of dread and started crying hysterically and praying and passed out.
content.summary: Multiple objects, triangles, saucer, ball of flame observed within 5 mile radius and seemed like we were chased. most activity above tmi and then a housing developement

content.detailedDescription:
I was at summer camp (near pikes peak region of cheesman mountain, colorado) with others (sixth graders) in 1977. along with teachers, there were about 30 of us students. 

that evening around 11pm, we had an astronomer scientist from norad visiting with us. he brought along a telescope for us to view the planet saturn. after multiple students looked at the planet, it was my turn to look ������  i was able to see the rings of saturn. as i was looking, i noticed a glowing light off in the distance out of the corner of my eye on the other side of the lake... it kept getting closer and closer -- no sound.  i got my teachers attention and asked her, "what is that?" she said, "a plane i think?" i then said, "at this altitude?!" it looked like a glowing fussy tennis ball.

it hovered above the trees about 10 feet, and it cast a soft white glow over the treetops. everyone else got real quiet and watched the object moved closer as well. i also noticed that even the bugs and frogs got quiet too. .... there was dead silence! then suddenly, the object stop just on the other side of the lake about 200 yards from us. then it made a 90˚ turn to the east going slowly at a 45˚ upwards back into the sky. after it went about a mile, it started speeding up and darted back up into space in a blink of an eye!

i turned around because i heard someone running down the hill -- it was the scientist. he jumped into his station wagon and took off! -- and left his telescope behind. we weren't sure what just happened, we were all sixth-graders. shortly after the sighting, the teachers sent us all off to bed and no one even discussed after that.

when we got back from camp, two plain dressed men showed up at our school asking questions about what we saw. most of the students didn't seem interested to make a statement, but i was! i told the men what happened. and since i loved to draw, i told them that i could draw what happened. so i made them a step-by-step storyboard of what happened that night.

they took my drawing and left. nothing more became of it. 

but a week later, i was out collecting pop bottles our local car wash in colorado springs, and i looked up and saw (3) shinny metallic disk about a mile up in the sky above my head. two of them were stationary, one was darting all around. while this was happening, they were climbing in altitude until they eventually were too high up for my eyes to see them anymore.

i never gave it much thought after that until i saw the film footage of the ufo's that appeared in mexico city during the eclipse --- and i thought to myself... "those are the ufo's i saw back in '77!" they looked exactly the same -- looked like two nickels rubbing together with a reddish glow on the bottom.

anyway, thats it. i have seen (3) other additional sightings, and but not like these two in the summer 1977.

thank you.
content.flightPath: Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: Summer sixth-grade camp sighting 1977 - colorado

content.detailedDescription:
Happen exactly on new year's eve 2014. i was at home. happened to step out to the patio when i noticed these orange orbs ascending and descending. i saw two of these at the same time, one to my left and one to my right in the distance. they did not move at a high rate, in fact, the orbs moved very slow, much slower than any commercial aircraft. therefore, i discarded immediately the idea that they could be commercial aircraft. i am within the vicinity of an airport, so i know their behaviour very well. the orbs, moved as if they didn't want to be noticed...That's the best way i can put it. nonetheless, i witnessed them ascend and descend, occasionally coming to a dead stop, just being stationary in mid-air, and then proceeding slowly and cautiously. there was at least two or three other ocassions as such, which happened later at night, 10pm or later. also same locations in the horizon as before. also, this time my significant other experienced them as well.
after witnessing these events for about two to three times, on different occassions. i felt curious to start researching about these ocurrences. additionally, a couple of my family members experinced ufo sitings as well. however, the other siting, witnessed by one of my family members, happened in the city of cape coral, fl. the others happened in lehigh acres, fl. simply out, i was in awe, and i am now very attentive at decyphering the sky at times. unfortunately i was not able to document the anamolies with either video or photographs.
content.flightPath: Stationary,Hovering then path,Straight-line path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: Happen exactly on new year's eve 2014 . i was at home. happened to step out to the patio when i noticed these orange orbs ascending and descending. i saw two of these at the same time, one to my left and one to my right in the distance.

content.detailedDescription: I was on my way to work as a us air force aircraft control & warning operator stationed at duluth air force base. i was going in to work the midnight shift from downtown duluth. i was riding down a back road to the east side of the main hwy. i was driving north to work when i saw brightness in my rear view mirror. i was driving on the road alone. i was driving with the car windows open there was no sound. the light around me got brighter and i looked out of the  front passenger window i saw it flying over me about 200 to 300ft above me it appeared round and completely the color of the brightest moonlight and as large as football field. it was moving about 5 to 10 mph faster than i was driving. i had full view riding down the road for what seemed about 5 to 7 minutes. i was of course shocked because i knew what i was seeing. i was not nervous or afraid just not believing what i was seeing. it went straight ahead rapidly. it just disappeared. when i got inside the building where i worked a young lt. was hysterically talking about seeing a ufo on the way to work. he was being escorted away from the weapons section back on to elevator i had just gotten off of talking about a ufo. i decided not to say anything to anyone. later in life i told my brothers about it and my son. i have been watching your program for years and decided to see if you are just television or real. well that is basically all that occurred for me on that day. i later heard around the job that a ufo had crashed in lake superior.                                        thank you timothy seidle
content.summary: I was on my way to work in air force sage building driving when ufo flew over my car

content.detailedDescription: Came into sky view at 9:40pm on june 19th 2014. continued straight north with no sound. a long cigar shaped, bronze colored object. lasting only about 5 seconds before out of view.
content.summary: Came into sky view at 9:40pm continued straight north work no sound. a long cigar shaped, bronze colored object. lasting only about 5 seconds before out of view.

content.detailedDescription:
I was picking up thai take out at thai restaurant when i noted a crowd on sidewalk pointing at sky to the south of restaurant,   out of curiosity went out to see what the crowd was looking at.    looked where crowd was pointing and saw small dark object with pulsating red light in center which was describing a random course in the sky ascending, descending and following an apparently random course.

at first i thought local authorities had a new drone and were playing with it but observation of the physics of the course soon disabused me of this line of thought.

object would climb rapidly and descend like a falling leaf and after each ascent / descent would shift to the right approximately 5 degrees of arc,  eventually object 'faded' out of sight.   

it was impossible to determine object's altitude other than the heavy overcast appeared that day to be at approximately 8000ft asl.   object may have been in clouds due to 'fuzzy' edges and it's apparent 'fade out' after 15 minutes.

object made no sound but object was apparently distant but overcast made distance estimation difficult.

there was a crowd of approximately 10-15 people outside watching the object until it faded from sight.

some details about the location 

1 - it was apparently 'over' franklin falls hydro plant #2
content.summary: Dark grey circular object with pulsating red light at center observed below cloud deck ascending and decending randomly

content.detailedDescription: Me and a buddy were going back home after the store, while traveling down a backroad i noticed a fast light moving through the sky then disappear. i looked at my friend and said "i think i saw a ufo!" he thought i was crazy then we saw the other three. after this we sped home and went to the gun room and locked the door. that is where we still are.
content.summary: Bright lights moving fast through the sky

content.detailedDescription: I went to check on my aunt's three dogs when they started barking in the south. i stood both amazed and frighented. i never in my life observed a ufo which i did study a couple of days before the sighting . i did call my aunt and brother but the didn't believe me and stayed in the house. during  the sighting one of my dogs whined at the ufo and i got a severe headache from the craft.
content.summary: Bright  ligted object with a gray/lead surface affected dogs and cats

content.detailedDescription: I took my dog out just prior to going to bed at 10:45pm as i do every night. we live on the third floor of an apartment building in irvine california. i happened to see a bright whitish orange-yellow light ascending up over the trees in the southeast sky which seemed to come toward me like a plane's head light (which is what i assumed it was), but then it just stopped and hovered where it was at. it seemed as if we're possibly 3-5 miles away, maybe less. i watched for a moment or two and then hurried to put my dog inside while i grabbed my iphone and headed back out and snapped several pictures. i then stood on the front walkway on the third floor of my building looking southeast and just watched it sit there for another 10 minutes hovering. during the time that the light was present, several helicopters were in the sky heading towards it.  one of the helicopters had a search light, but the light was swirling around skyward instead of toward the ground as they do when conducting a typical search. i watched in amazement thinking there had to be a logical explanation and that it would eventually end up being a common object that i would be able to recognize, but it remained stationary. then it was as if someone just turned out the light. it seemed as if it was still there after the light went out. upon examining my pictures, i noticed the light seemed to have a distinctive circular shape with almost a separate round spot in the center that stayed consistent in each picture whether it was a zoom shot or a regular one. today, i google to see if anyone else had reported anything similar and a gentleman from temecula,ca videotaped the very same thing last night as well. temecula is to the southeast of where i am.
content.summary: I saw what i thought to be a plane headlight ascend and come toward me but it never went anywhere and just hovered above the horizon. several helicopters were heading towards it from several directions and then it blinked out.

content.detailedDescription: I am an avid sky watcher was in my backyard noticed star like orb moving across sky then a few others wich is very unusual i watch sky often. sky periodically lit up in blue flashes that filled the night. saw a bright flash and then a star like orb moved across the sky and diss appeared. continue to see other star like objects move across the sky. sometimes they disappear. saw helicopter too. i know they were not planes. gave me a feeling that something is happening.
content.summary: Sky periodically lit up with blue flashes. saw very many star like orbs appear disappear flash and go across sky

content.detailedDescription:
My teenage son and i were driving toward our home in powhatan, coming from midlothian.  it was around 9 pm when we notices a delta-shaped aircraft flying along side of us, although it was 
to our left above the treetops.  it looked as if it were facing east but was travelling backwards with us as we drove west.  as i remember it had at least 3 red lights:  one toward the nose and one
near the top of each "wing."  it made not a sound.  it seemed as it was following us; i got spooked
and then my son said, "let's get out of here!", and i floored the accelerator without looking back.

during the late 90's there were alot of ufo sightings along huguenot trail and around judes ferry road, next to my house.  there were orange balls that separated, came together, then sped into invisibility (this i saw at least 4 times).  also very high in the sky there were objects that looked like distant planets or stars that would move suddenly!  

my son had night terrors of craft landing on our property during those years, but i never took them as real.

the ufo activity in that area seemed to slow down and even stop in the early 2000's.  i am reporting this now because i just heard about mufon taking reports, and i have never forgotten these odd sightings.
content.summary: Craft nose pointed east but traveledeast following our car and totally silent flying to our left just above the pine trees of even height

content.detailedDescription: Floating bright object brighter then all stars in sky with no blinking lights and moving very slow
content.summary: Floating object
